machines.name: ftp-server
machines.role: Legacy FTP server hosting corporate backup files with misconfigured permissions

machines.name: attacker-kali
machines.role: Penetration testing machine with network analysis and FTP exploitation tools

dependencies: Attacker must discover FTP service through network reconnaissance
Anonymous FTP access leads to encrypted backup files
Backup file decryption reveals credentials for privileged FTP access
Privileged access reveals hidden directory containing the flag

scenario.title: Corporate Backup Breach
scenario.description: A corporation's legacy FTP server contains sensitive backup files. The server has been misconfigured, allowing unauthorized access to encrypted archives that may contain valuable information.
stages: Network reconnaissance to discover the FTP service
Exploit anonymous FTP access to retrieve backup files
Decrypt backup archives to extract credentials
Use discovered credentials for privileged FTP access
Navigate hidden directories to locate the corporate flag
